text: Mario Moreno Burgos (December 31, 1935 – March 2, 2005) was a Chilean footballer. He played for the Chilean team Colo-Colo from 1960 to 1970 and represented the Chile national football team at the 1962 FIFA World Cup. ==Honours== Colo-Colo * Primera Division (3): 1960, 1963, 1970 ==External links== * Profile at FIFA.com Category:1935 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Chilean footballers Category:Chile international footballers Category:Colo-Colo footballers Category:1962 FIFA World Cup players Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Mario Moreno (footballer)
